demos.name: Northwind Trading Company
demos.summary: Classic relational database with customers, orders, products, employees, and suppliers. 13 interconnected tables demonstrating joins, aggregations, and business analytics.
demos.author: Delta Forge Team

demos.name: Sales Data Quickstart
demos.summary: Minimal sales dataset to get started quickly. Two CSV files showing basic queries, filtering, and aggregations.
demos.author: Delta Forge Team

demos.name: CSV Advanced Options Testbench
demos.summary: Verifies that every CSV parsing option (delimiter, null_value, comment_char, skip_rows, max_rows, trim_whitespace, quote, escape) is correctly wired from the GUI to the backend. Each table exercises one option with data that exposes incorrect parsing.
demos.author: Delta Forge Team

demos.name: XML Books — Schema Evolution
demos.summary: Demonstrates XML schema evolution across 5 catalog export files spanning 2000–2004. Each year adds new elements (isbn, publisher, rating, edition, series) and one drops description. Verifies the union schema, NULL filling, and attribute extraction.
demos.author: Delta Forge Team

categories.name: Getting Started
categories.description: Quick introductory demos to learn Delta Forge basics
